https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/h11FpWjPtsAJdgHvfo4DmbDg7WH.jpg When Detective Bennett O'Mara finds a chocolate wrapper on a strangled girl, it leads him to enigmatic chocolatier Juliana Lovece. Just as this perceptive woman gets under his hardened skin, he suspects she may be at the centre of an increasing murder count. Dripping in Chocolate
